steps.value: Given I am on main application page
When I change window size to `${resolution}`

scenarios.title: check that user is redirected to correct page after clicking on dropdown tile

steps: When I click on element located by `testId(<tile-id>)`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//header)`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-flyout-menu)`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='<tile-id>']/..)`

steps.value: When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-my-cases-tile-button)))`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `((/my-cases))`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//header)`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-flyout-menu)`
When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@data-test-id='((jnj-my-cases-tile-button))']/..)`
